api_list.name: Validate_Email
api_list.description: This endpoint will return if the email address is disposable or not, also it validates the format of the email as well.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://email-validation12.p.rapidapi.com/support@rapidapi.com"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "email-validation12.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://email-validation12.p.rapidapi.com/{email}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "email-validation12.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
